mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATED) VALUES (#{board_name}, #{board_title},#{board_content}, NOW())
INSERT INTO BOARD_FILE (BOARD_NO, ORIGINAL_NAME, SAVE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXTENSION) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{originalName}, #{saveName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExtension})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATED, UPDATED_AT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.update: update board set BOARD_NAME = #{board_name}, BOARD_TITLE = #{board_title}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{board_content}, UPDATED_AT = NOW() WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULER(USER_ID, SCHEDULE_DATE, CONTENT) VALUES (#{user_id},#{schedule_date},#{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULER SET CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATE_AT = NOW() WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = #{schedule_id}
